metadata.title: CVE-2015-4141 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The WPS UPnP function in hostapd, when using WPS AP, and wpa_supplicant,when using WPS external registrar (ER), 0.7.0 through 2.4 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a negative chunk length,which triggers an out-of-bounds read or heap-based buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu3
wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu3
wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-0ubuntu8').
wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-0ubuntu8').
